abstract: Microsoft is closing Windows Live Expo, the classified advertising Web site that was initially seen as a potential competitor to Craigslist.
snippet: Microsoft is closing Windows Live Expo, the classified advertising Web site that was initially seen as a potential competitor to Craigslist.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft is closing Windows Live Expo, the classified advertising Web site that was initially seen as a potential competitor to Craigslist, the San Francisco-based online classified service. The service, started in February 2006, will close on July 31, a post on the site said Friday. Live Expo was one of a series of services Microsoft started to beef up its online presence.

headline.main: Microsoft Is Closing a Classified Ad Site
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Is Closing a Classified Ad Site
